Package be.fedict.eid.applet.service

This package contains the service components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Address Holds all the fields within the eID address file.
AppletServiceServlet The eID applet service Servlet.
EIdCertsData Data structure to hold the eID X509 certificates.
EIdData Top-level eID data container.
HSTSFilter HTTP Strict-Transport-Security servlet filter.
Identity Holds all fields within the eID identity file.
JSONServlet Servlet to retrieve the eID identity data from the HTTP session context via JSON.
KmlServlet Servlet that outputs the eID identity data from the HTTP session to a zipped KML (.kmz) Can be used by virtual globes like Google Earth, KDE Marble...
PdfServlet Servlet that outputs the eID identity data from the HTTP session to a PDF.
PhotoServlet Servlet to display the citizen's photo that is stored in the HTTP session after a successful eID identification operation via the eID Applet.
VcardServlet Servlet that outputs the eID identity data from the HTTP session to a vCard 3.0 Can be used by address books
 

Enum Summary
DocumentType Enumeration for eID Document Type.
Gender Gender enumeration.
SpecialOrganisation Special Organisation enumeration.
SpecialStatus eID Special Status.
 

Package be.fedict.eid.applet.service Description

This package contains the service components.
